flawed_nl_solution:
The 10 people shovel 10000 pounds per 10 days, or 10000/10=<<10000/10=1000>>1000 pounds per day per 10 people.
And 1000 pounds per day per 10 people is 1000/10=<<1000/10=1000>>1000 pounds per day per person.
Half of ten people is 10/2=<<10/2=5>>5 people.
At 1000 pounds per day per person, 5 people can shovel 5*1000=<<5*1000=5000>>5000 pounds per day.
Therefore, for 5 people to shovel 40000 pounds, it will take 40000/5000=<<40000/5000=8>>8 days.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
